title: LISTEN: The Debate podcast - Danny Murphy, Henry Winter and Christian Purslow
description: Listen back to the latest edition of The Debate, as Danny Murphy, Henry Winter and Christian Purslow joined David Prutton to discuss the big football talking points.
content: Up for discussion was how Liverpool should reinvest the money gained from selling Philippe Coutinho to Barcelona for Â£146m.Arsenal's early FA Cup exit to Nottingham Forest and the introduction of VAR also featured, having been trialled in Brighton's FA Cup win over Crystal Palace.All that and more in the latest The Debate podcast.Listen to The Debate and subscribe to more podcasts via iTunes
